entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
